E.Name: DBEventLogStarted
E.Description: Fired when an AGC database event log is started.
E.Format: An AGC database event log was started for server %.ComputerName%.

E.Name: DBEventLogStopped
E.Description: Fired when an AGC database event log is stopped.
E.Format: An AGC database event log was stopped for server %.ComputerName%.
An AGC NT Event Log was started for server %.ComputerName%.
E.Name: NTEventLogStarted
E.Description: Fired when an AGC NT Event Log is started.

E.Format: An AGC NT Event Log was stopped for server %.ComputerName%.
E.Description: Fired when an AGC NT Event log is stopped.
E.Name: NTEventLogStopped

E.Format: An AGC Event was triggered prior to the initialization of the AGC module.
E.Description: Fired when an AGC event is triggered prior to AGC being initialized.
E.Name: AGCNotInitialized
AGCAssert
E.Description: Fired when a generic assert occurs.

E.Name: StationCreated
E.Description: Fired when a station is created.

E.Name: StationDeleted
E.Description: Fired when a station is destroyed.

E.Name: StationChangesSides
E.Description: Fired when a station changes sides.

E.Name: StationCreatedEscort
E.Description: Fired when a station is created. Contains a shiplist

E.Name: StationDeletedEscort
E.Description: Fired when a station is destroyed. Contains a shiplist

E.Name: StationChangesSidesEscort
E.Description: Fired when a station changes sides. Contains a shiplist

E.Format: %.SubjectName% changed sectors to '%New Sector Name%' (%New Sector%) from '%Old Sector Name%' (%Old Sector%)
E.Name: ShipChangesSectors
E.Description: Fired when a ship changes sectors.

E.Name: ShipKilled
E.Description: Fired when a ship is killed.

E.Name: ShipUsesRipcord
E.Description: Fired when a ship uses a ripcord.

E.Name: Initialize
E.Description: Fired when Allsrv is initializing.

E.Name: Terminate
E.Description: Fired when Allsrv is shutting down.

E.Name: BadFtpPath
E.Description: Fired when unable to access ftp path.
E.Format: Invalid or missing ftp path.\nPath = '%Path%'\nRun SrvConfig or check FTP server.

E.Name: PlayerDropped
E.Description: Fired when a player is dropped unexpectedly.

E.Name: SessionLost
E.Description: Fired when DirectPlay session is lost.

E.Name: MsgFromUnknownPlayer
E.Description: Fired when message received from unknown player.

E.Name: IncreaseTokensMax
E.Description: Fired when internal constant cTokensMax needs to be increased.
E.Format: Allegiance: cTokensMax needs to be increased.

E.Name: InvalidZoneTicket
E.Description: Fired when an invalid zone ticket received!
E.Format: Allegiance: Hacker alert! Invalid zone ticket received!

E.Name: DecryptTicketFailed
E.Description: Fired when DecryptTicket fails.
E.Format: DecryptTicket failed for an unexpected reason.  Report to dev team immediately.

E.Name: NoTicket
E.Description: Fired when login attempted with no ticket and no character name.
E.Format: Login attempted with no ticket and no character name.

E.Name: LoginFailed
E.Description: Fired when database error is preventing access to the character info.
E.Format: Database error is preventing access to the character info.

E.Name: CreateCharFailed
E.Description: Fired when character could not be created in the database.
E.Format: Character could not be created in the database.

E.Name: BadClientVersion
E.Description: Fired when client tried to login with bad version.
E.Format: Client tried to login with bad version.\nServer version = '%ServerVer%'\nClient version = '%ClientVer%'

E.Name: MessageBox
E.Description: Fired when generic message box function called from within the game server.

E.Name: MoneyError
E.Description: Fired when player donated towards something, and now has negative money.
E.Format:
Player donated towards something, and now has negative money.
Player = '%PlayerName%'
Amount given = '%MoneyGiven%'
New balance = '%MoneyLeft%'

E.Name: Connecting
E.Description: Fired when game server prepares to connect to lobby.

E.Name: ConnectError
E.Description: Fired when game server fails to connect to lobby.
E.Format: Game server failed to connect to lobby.

E.Name: NoLobby
E.Description: Fired when there is no lobby server specified on the game server.
E.Format: No lobby server specified.  Run SrvConfig.\nOnly lobby mode is currently supported.

E.Name: HostSession
E.Description: Fired when game server is preparing session for clients.

E.Name: CantHostSession
E.Description: Fired when game server cannot host session.
E.Format: Cannot host session. Check for correct dplay installation.

E.Name: CantWatchArt
E.Description: Fired when registry Key for FTP/HTTP auto-update is invalid or missing.
E.Format: Registry Key for FTP auto-update is invalid or missing.\nAutoUpdate may be disabled.

E.Name: StartingService
E.Description: Fired when game server is starting as an NT service.
E.Format: Game server starting as an NT service.

E.Name: ZoneAuthServer
E.Description: Fired when game server fails to load zoneauth.dll and/or authauthdecrypt.dll.
E.Format: Game server failed to load zoneauth.dll and/or authauthdecrypt.dll. Verify that they are both registered.

E.Name: Assert
E.Description: Fired when a generic assert occurs in the game server.

E.Name: ArtChangedInInit
E.Description: Fired when art changes during initialization.
E.Format: Art Directory's contents changed during AllSrv's initialization.\nPlease restart the server.

E.Name: SystemError
E.Description: Fired when a service-related system error occurs.

E.Name: LostLobby
E.Description: Fired when the game server loses its connection to the lobby server.

E.Name: GameStarted
E.Description: Fired when a game is started.

E.Name: GameEnded
E.Description: Fired when a game is ended on the game server.

E.Name: GameOver
E.Description: Fired when a game has been completed on the game server.
E.Format: Game over (but mission still active until all players out).

E.Name: LatencyExceeded
E.Description: Fired when the update latency on the game server exceeds thresholds.

E.Name: ConnectedLobby
E.Description: Fired when game server successfully connects to a lobby.

E.Name: DisconnectingLobby
E.Description: Fired when game server prepares to disconnect from a lobby.

E.Name: DisconnectedLobby
E.Description: Fired when game server successfully disconnects from a lobby.

E.Name: DatabaseErrorSQL
E.Description: Fired when there's a SQL database error

E.Name: Pause
E.Description: Fired when the server is paused

E.Name: Continue
E.Description: Fired when server is continued (from being paused)

E.Name: DatabaseErrorOLEDB
E.Description: Fired when there's an OLE DB specific database error

E.Name: ServerShutdown
E.Description: Fired when the server is shut down.

E.Name: NewSession
E.Description: Fired when an Allegiance Admin Object Model client application creates a session.

E.Name: LoginServer
E.Description: Fired when a user logs in to the server.

E.Name: LogoutServer
E.Description: Fired when a user logs off from the server.

E.Name: ChatMessage
E.Description: Fired when a chat is sent.

E.Name: AdminPage
E.Description: Fired when a chat is directed to an administrator.

E.Name: AdminChat
E.Description: Fired when an administrator calls the AdminSession.SendAdminChat method.

E.Name: GameCreated
E.Description: Fired when a game is created.

E.Name: GameDestroyed
E.Description: Fired when a game was destroyed.

E.Format: The parameters of game (id=%.SubjectID% name='%.SubjectName%' were changed.
E.Name: GameStateChange
E.Description: Fired when a game's GameParameters property changes during the phase before the game starts.

E.Name: LoginGame
E.Description: Fired when a user joins a game.

E.Name: LogoutGame
E.Description: Fired when a user quits a game.

E.Name: JoinTeam
E.Description: Fired when a user joins a team.

E.Name: LeaveTeam
E.Description: Fired when a user quits a team.

E.Format: Team '%.SubjectName%' (%.SubjectID%) in game '%.GameName%' (%.GameID%) changed.\nNew team name = '%NewTeamName%'
E.Name: TeamInfoChange
E.Description: Fired when information about a team changes.

E.Format: Possible hack attempt made by %.SubjectName%. Player not booted from the server.\nLine: %Line%\nExpression: %Expr%
E.Name: HackLog
E.Description: Fired when a possible hack attempt has occurred but the player does not get booted.

E.Format: Possible hack attempt made by %.SubjectName%. Player has been booted from the server.\nLine: %Line%\nExpression: %Expr%
E.Name: HackBoot
E.Description: Fired when a possible hack attempt has occurred and the player gets booted.

E.Format: Possible hack attempt made by an unknown player. Connection has been disconnected.\nLine: %Line%\nExpression: %Expr%
E.Name: HackBootNoPlayer
E.Description: Fired when a possible hack attempt has occurred and the player is not known.
